mapper.select:
SELECT `id` id, `mchn` mchn, `seq_no` seqNo, `company_name` companyName, `registered_date` registeredDate, `legalperson_name` legalpersonName, `cert_no` certNo, `mobile` mobile, `email` email, `third_party_payment_id` thirdPartyPaymentId, `actionType` actionType, `license_number` licenseNumber, `tax_no` taxNo, `organization_code` organizationCode, `platform_username` platformUsername, `gold_acc_login_name` goldAccLoginName, `remark` remark, `user_attributes` userAttributes, `bank_license` bankLicense, `org_credit_code` orgCreditCode, `unite_credit_code` uniteCreditCode From `t_gq_fss_sftp_corporate` t
AND t.`mchn` like CONCAT('%',#{mchn},'%')
AND t.`company_name` like CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%')
